MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode areas of Holyhead and Porthdafarch, affecting properties in Lon Isallt and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:22am on 1st November 2020.
